item.title: Need help (forum)
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

microsoft offers a free website domain thingy… you need a credit card to start it but they dont charge you or anything.

The credit card is so tons of fricken little kids dont make little sites like crazy but no they dont charge you here i’ll get link…

http://office.microsoft.com/en-us/officelive/default.aspx?xid=c2logo

plz post if i helped you
